General.Name: G-bits Network Technology Xiamen Co Ltd
General.Description: G-bits Network Technology (Xiamen) Co., Ltd. develops and operates of video games. The company offers client, web, mobile, and VR games. G-bits Network Technology (Xiamen) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Xiamen, China.
